name: Quoteoftheday
0:
”Alexa, open Quote of the day”
”Alexa, ask quote of the day What's a good quote”
”Alexa, ask quote of the day to tell me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quote of the day
des:
This skill will enable Alexa to share some words of wisdom with you from a carefully curated selection of inspiring quotes.

No extra prerequisites required to use this skill as long as you have an Alexa enabled device. Just say, "Alexa, open Quote of the day", and be inspired!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
